name: Universe Sandbox Â²
description: Create & destroy on an unimaginable scale... with a space simulator that merges real-time gravity, climate, collision, and material interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet. Includes VR support for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift+Touch, and Windows Mixed Reality.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ (64-bit*) Processor: 1.6GHz dual-core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory, Shader Model 4.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: * A 64-bit version of Windows is required for Universe Sandbox updates after November 2018. Users on 32-bit systems can still run previous versions. <a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=http://universesandbox.com/blog/2018/08/dx9-32-bit-support/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"  >Learn more
recommended_requirements: Processor: 2.6GHz quad-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: For VR, see recommendations from your headset manufacturer
